text: Paavo Juhani Tirkkonen (2 December 1947 – 5 August 2012) was a Finnish ice hockey defenceman and Olympian. Tirkkonen played with Team Finland at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France.https://www.hockey- reference.com/olympics/athletes/paavo-tirkkonen-1 He previously played for SaPKo Savonlinna in SM-Liiga.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved June 29, 2015 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Finnish ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Finland Category:People from Savonlinna
title: Paavo Tirkkonen
